name: Last Monarch
description:
This game is SFW version of Last Devil. For updates, please visit the MangoCouncil official website.









Survive the wilderness, gather companions, and restore your throne to its former glory in this fast-paced roguelite shooting game!




【WASD】 Movement
【F】 Interact/Open
【LMB】 Normal Attack
【RMB】 Skill
【Space】 Dash
【Q】 Throw
【E】 Companion Skill
【P】 Suicide
【TAB】 Backpack
【ESC】 Options







1. Collect items and stack buffs to upgrade your skills and abilities. 【Create your own builds】



2. Smooth and intuitive combat. Use Dash to dodge attacks and execute your counterattack!


3. Anything can happen on an adventure! Interact with characters, events environments to pick up new abilities... or crippling curses.


4. Get all lovey-dovey with the three main characters as you experience their stories. Find out their needs, and let them satisfy yours...



5. Completing the campaign unlocks and infinite challenge mode, with more random events and stronger enemies.【For gamers who relish a challenge】



6. Take cover using the rich and varied environments, but watch out! Some of them can be destroyed...
